title: Retro Poster Font ID
content:
Hello all,

Found this font on a poster while I was browsing Google images.  
It looks like a bit like a lighter Creampuff.

Any ideas? Typical font search engines return no results.

Font: 

 Mission Script 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317051616/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

author: Thorens

comments.content: That looks like it is spot on. Thanks alot!
